entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
